snippet: Wall to Wall, an annual daylong tribute at Symphony Space, was devoted to Gertrude Stein and her musical and literary circle.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews musical performances at the 2012 Wall to Wall concert, an annual daylong tribute at Symphony Space, which focused on the life and work of Gertrude Stein and her musical and literary circle.
lead_paragraph: Wall to Wall, an annual daylong tribute at Symphony Space, was devoted to Gertrude Stein and her musical and literary circle.

headline.seo: ‘Wall to Wall Gertrude’s Paris’ at Symphony Space
headline.main: Convening a Salon for Gertrude Stein and Friends
headline.print_headline: Convening a Salon for Gertrude Stein and Friends
